document_data.name: Halassa's Waterwell & Fine Wines
document_data.mainbody: '''Halassa's Waterwell & Fine Wines''' was a spirits shop found in the city of [[Yartar]]. It was owned by the acerbic proprietor [[Halassa]], an elderly woman who seemed to know every single person in [[the North]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located just south of the [[Fishyard]] marketplace.
document_data.Structure: Located within Halassa's was its namesake well. The well was encircled by the establishment's well-stocked cellars that went deep underground.
document_data.Services: Halassa sold a great variety of spirits, of [[human]], [[dwarven]], [[halfling]], and [[gnomish]] origin, at very sensible prices. Additionally, she offered a complimentary bucket of cooled well water to any Yartarran that requested one.
